thread.title: Great hotel in Rome - Review
thread.title_full: Great hotel in Rome - Review of Hotel De Petris, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Karsten R
title: Great hotel in Rome - Review
text:
We spent 4 days in Rome. Stayed at the Hotel De Petris.
It is located very central in Rome, only 4 minutes walk from Fontana deTrevi. 15- 20 minutes walk form Termini(cental train station).
We had an excellent room. Breakfast was served at the terrace at top with a great view over Rome.
The prices for the room was very fair.
I will give my recommendation to this hotel.
